co.cask.cdap.internal.workflow

Class ProgramWorkflowAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.internal.workflow.ProgramWorkflowAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowAction, Runnable

    public final class ProgramWorkflowAction
extends Object
implements WorkflowAction
    Action to be executed in Workflow for Programs. run() does a call on Callable of RuntimeContext.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(WorkflowContext context)
                throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: WorkflowAction
        Initializes a WorkflowAction. This method is called before the Runnable.run() method.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface WorkflowAction
        Parameters:
        context - Context object containing runtime information for this action.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is any error during initialization. When an exception is thrown, the execution of this action is treated as failure of the Workflow.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: WorkflowAction
        This method is called after the Runnable.run() method completes and it can be used for resource cleanup. Any exception thrown only gets logged but does not affect execution of the Workflow.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface WorkflowAction
